It acts as a comprehensive registry for Python modules, distinguishing between project-specific code and third-party dependencies.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"907d99cc-cc13-495a-96d4-25e62cad1766","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"By maintaining a clear map of modules and their internal contents, this file enables the analysis engine to resolve imports, navigate function definitions, and understand the boundaries of the system under review.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"01abca96-ba95-4aa2-b24c-0cbf4aaeb08d","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"46a201fb-af17-421a-8f9d-f4c38bb43d17","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Core Purpose and Role","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"565413be-da05-44da-9055-e76012a73685","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The primary goal of this module is to provide a structured \"Table of Contents\" for the entire codebase:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"820388a4-3fef-4497-99d7-2a00f1cdf506","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Boundary Management","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It separates the world into ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Internal","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" modules (the code we are analyzing) and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"External","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" modules (libraries like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"os","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"flask","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"requests","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8ab62c4c-24ac-431a-9003-d6a959601fcd","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Structural Mapping","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It catalogs the contents of individual files, specifically tracking where functions and methods are defined.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"baf7236c-627f-4f82-b536-83b56a5f4a28","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Local Resolution","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It maintains a set of \"local\" modules to ensure that the analyzer correctly prioritizes project files during import resolution.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5ac5d1a1-9b8f-4f14-a4cc-e184ad642c4d","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Source Attribution","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It links symbolic names to physical file paths and line numbers, allowing the engine to provide accurate reports on where specific logic resides.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f01f02de-53ce-473b-b720-b0df876a712e","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"d5a4bfba-5482-46c4-8b87-eaa1cc286ac9","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Key Components","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cfabf30e-1615-48dc-ac66-ad76c1b17a13","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"ModuleManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (The Librarian)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0f9362ad-6a04-47dc-b65b-8f816c1b8b8c","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ModuleManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is the high-level orchestrator of the module system. It manages the lifecycle of module registration and retrieval. It is responsible for:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f6568b1e-9d13-466e-aa77-14dfe3eb1ce2","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Classification","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Sorting modules into internal or external registries.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3174e3c1-e609-4b2e-b706-987d5d5d4db1","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Search and Discovery","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Providing a unified interface to find modules and the functions within them.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0f061c75-8dc5-4baa-ad58-975c53346ab3","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Local Tracking","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Monitoring which namespaces belong to the immediate project environment.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8798d0fb-c0c9-4a20-98f2-349d9d408f0a","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Module","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (The File Representation)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bb81b74d-e557-4ec3-9152-e50ecfd016c4","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Module","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class represents a single Python source file. It is a metadata container that stores:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7e9c3a89-3042-44dd-8ac5-8bb00ee69b18","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Identifiers","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The fully qualified namespace and the physical file path.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"211bea0e-0f79-4882-9f1d-e1dbfc02586c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function Registry","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": A mapping of method names to their coordinates (starting and ending line numbers) within the file.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"938b1783-fbe6-4409-9fba-57ba284a4086","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"d83981aa-6d2a-4866-b589-7ba1d0c7283a","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"System Integration & Relationship","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2040b600-f82d-4b18-ae4d-824a5dbc76cd","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"modules","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" module serves as a critical bridge between the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"File System","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Analysis Engine","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":":","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2daa7ccc-00cc-434d-be23-df641ac7558a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Initialization","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": During the discovery phase, Jarvis scans directories and uses the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ModuleManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to register every ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":".py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" file it finds.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d4b52c9f-0067-47b6-beba-4c4ffb74dde7","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Contextual Analysis","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": When the analyzer moves from one file to another via an import or a function call, it queries the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ModuleManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to verify the existence of the target and retrieve its metadata.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9918bd80-342f-465c-86bf-31adb56f6c1d","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Reporting","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": When a security vulnerability or a code pattern is detected, the engine uses the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Module","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" objects to report the exact file path and line range where the issue occurs.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6436e4a5-bbd6-4088-ad6a-4bf2015f538e","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"0c9c71d4-0098-44d2-898a-4bb58874090e","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Brief Insight / Tutorial","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6ab65792-86f2-4870-9d45-b154f9c04519","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Organizing a Project Scan","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a5e30e9c-aa89-436c-a76d-157d96977d24","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"When Jarvis begins an analysis, it populates these structures to create a \"digital twin\" of the project:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f406d502-be09-4ece-b918-d2e69aadd725","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Creation","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": As the parser finds ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"auth.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", it calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"module_manager.create(\"app.auth\", \"src/auth.py\")","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"48e72477-b295-4557-ae98-ca783e191aad","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Indexing","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": As the parser reads the code, it tells the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Module","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" object about the functions it sees: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"auth_module.add_method(\"login\", first=10, last=45)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ed4f6d68-f0cf-4480-97f7-af8bec8b2168","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Verification","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Later, if the analyzer sees a call to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"app.auth.login","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", it can confirm the module exists and immediately know that the logic for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"login","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" spans lines 10 to 45 in the source file.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b7be73d3-e524-4352-9715-8593adb3fec2","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This structured approach ensures that no matter how large the project grows, the analysis engine can quickly find and inspect any piece of code.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f3d178ff-23bf-4052-b894-dee7825e9248","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
